message: Let's start fair. I'll take the lion's share, but you get a decent starting point.
You took the lion's share last round, now it's my turn!
Let's be reasonable. I'm still willing to take the majority, but I'll give you a bit more this time.
You're not getting the majority, I'm taking control!
I'm starting to get worried about inflation. Let's find a compromise before it eats away all our profits. I'm willing to give you a bigger share.
I'm not going to let inflation ruin my chances, I want the majority now!
This is getting serious. We need to reach an agreement soon before inflation completely wipes us out. Let's split the money more evenly this time.
You're getting desperate, I'm taking the majority now!
We're running out of time, Bob. We both need to compromise. Let's split the money 60/40 this time to ensure we both get something.
